titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Evaporated Milk Association Pamphlet Collection, 1924-c.1929

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2017-033

defitem.label: Processed by: Kira A. Dietz. Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Evaporated Milk Association Pamphlet Collection consists of a binder of pamphlets explaining evaoprated milk and the benefits of its use and consumption. The binder was sent as a group to libraries and includes two introductory letters, 26 pamphlets, and 4 scientific reports, the majority of which date from about the 1920s.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from [Enter collection title] must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Evaporated Milk Association Pamphlet Collection, Ms2017-033, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Evaporated Milk Association Pamphlet Collection was purchased by Special Collections in September 2017.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Evaporated Milk Association Pamphlet Collection was completed in September 2017.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Evaporated Milk Association Pamphlet Collection consists of a binder of pamphlets explaining evaoprated milk and the benefits of its use and consumption. The binder was sent as a group to libraries and includes two introductory letters, 26 pamphlets, and 4 scientific reports, the majority of which date from about the 1920s.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: While materials were removed from the binder for preservation purposes, the items are in their original order.
